messages.title: A personal message from Thomas O'MALLEY
messages.content: Committed to service at all times; offers a personal message to the constituents.

messages.title: Long-Term Economic Plan
messages.content: Emphasizes the party's economic plan and reduction of the deficit.

messages.title: Excellent schools for Ealing North
messages.content: Focus on creating excellent schools and ensuring children get the best start in life.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continuation of the Long-Term Economic Plan, reducing the deficit, and helping to keep interest rates down.

issues.brexitEurope: Emphasizes the importance of a referendum on Europe and letting the British people decide.
issues.economy: References to economic growth, reducing the deficit, and stabilising the economy.
issues.education: Commitment to excellent schools and improving children's start in life.

leaflet.personalStatement: There is a reiteration of the candidate's commitment to service at all times.

images.caption: Photos of Thomas O'Malley with political figures and constituents.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes several comparisons with opposition policies and highlights risks if those are implemented.
